00043 void BaseMobility::initialize(int stage)
00044 {
00045     BaseModule::initialize(stage);
00046 
00047     if (stage == 0){
00048         hasPar("coreDebug") ? coreDebug = par("coreDebug").boolValue() : coreDebug = false;
00049 
00050         coreEV << "initializing BaseMobility stage " << stage << endl;
00051 
00052         // get utility pointers (world and host)
00053     world = FindModule<BaseWorldUtility*>::findGlobalModule();
00054         if (world == NULL)
00055             error("Could not find BaseWorldUtility module");
00056 
00057         coreEV << "initializing BaseUtility stage " << stage << endl; // for node position
00058 
00059         //get a pointer to the host
00060         hostPtr = findHost();
00061         hostId = hostPtr->getId();
00062 
00063 
00064         if (hasPar("updateInterval")) {
00065           updateInterval = par("updateInterval");
00066         } else {
00067             updateInterval = 0;
00068         }
00069 
00070     // initialize Move parameter
00071         bool use2D = world->use2D();
00072 
00073         double x = -1.0;
00074         double y = -1.0;
00075         double z = -1.0;
00076         //read coordinates from parameters if available
00077         if (hasPar("x") && hasPar("y") && (hasPar("z") || use2D)){
00078             x = par("x");
00079             y = par("y");
00080             if(!use2D) {
00081                 z = par("z");
00082             }
00083     }
00084 
00085         //a coordinate of -1.0 means random position
00086         if (x == -1.0 || y == -1.0 || (z == -1.0 && !use2D)) {
00087             move.startPos = world->getRandomPosition();
00088         } else {
00089             if (use2D) {
00090                 move.startPos = Coord(x, y);
00091             } else {
00092                 move.startPos = Coord(x, y, z);
00093             }
00094 
00095         }
00096     coreEV << "start pos: " << move.startPos.info() << endl;
00097         //check whether position is within the playground
00098         if (!move.startPos.isInRectangle(Coord(use2D), world->getPgs())) {
00099             error("node position specified in omnetpp.ini exceeds playgroundsize");
00100         }
00101 
00102         move.speed = 0;
00103         move.startTime = simTime();
00104         move.direction = Coord(use2D);
00105 
00106         //get BBItem category for Move
00107         moveCategory = utility->getCategory(&move);
00108 
00109     }
00110     else if (stage == 1){
00111         coreEV << "initializing BaseMobility stage " << stage << endl;
00112         // print new host position on the screen and update bb info
00113         updatePosition();
00114 
00115         if (move.speed > 0 && updateInterval > 0) {
00116       coreEV << "Host is moving, speed=" << move.speed << " updateInterval=" << updateInterval << endl;
00117       moveMsg = new cMessage("move", MOVE_HOST);
00118       //host moves the first time after some random delay to avoid synchronized movements
00119             scheduleAt(simTime() + uniform(0, updateInterval), moveMsg);
00120         }
00121     }
00122 }

00129 void BaseMobility::handleMessage(cMessage * msg)
00130 {
00131     if (!msg->isSelfMessage())
00132         error("mobility modules can only receive self messages");
00133 
00134 
00135     if(msg->getKind() == MOVE_TO_BORDER){
00136   handleBorderMsg(msg);
00137     }
00138     else{
00139   handleSelfMsg(msg);
00140     }
00141 }
00142 
00143 
00152 void BaseMobility::handleSelfMsg(cMessage * msg)
00153 {
00154     makeMove();
00155     updatePosition();
00156 
00157     if( !moveMsg->isScheduled() && move.speed > 0)
00158   scheduleAt(simTime() + updateInterval, msg);
00159     else{
00160   delete msg;
00161   moveMsg = NULL;
00162     }
00163 }

00174 void BaseMobility::handleBorderMsg(cMessage * msg)
00175 {
00176     coreEV << "start MOVE_TO_BORDER:" << move.info() << endl;
00177 
00178     BorderMsg* bMsg = static_cast<BorderMsg*>(msg);
00179 
00180     switch( bMsg->getPolicy() ){
00181     case REFLECT:
00182   move.startPos = bMsg->getStartPos();
00183   move.direction = bMsg->getDirection();
00184   break;
00185     case WRAP:
00186   move.startPos = bMsg->getStartPos();
00187   break;
00188     case PLACERANDOMLY:
00189   move.startPos = bMsg->getStartPos();
00190   coreEV << "new random position: " << move.startPos.info() << endl;
00191   break;
00192     case RAISEERROR:
00193   error("node moved outside the playground");
00194   break;
00195     default:
00196   error("Unknown BorderPolicy!");
00197     }
00198 
00199     fixIfHostGetsOutside();
00200 
00201     updatePosition();
00202 
00203     delete bMsg;
00204 
00205     coreEV << "end MOVE_TO_BORDER:" << move.info() << endl;
00206 }

00217 void BaseMobility::updatePosition() {
00218     EV << "updatePosition: " << move.info() << endl;
00219 
00220     //publish the the new move
00221     utility->publishBBItem(moveCategory, &move, hostId);
00222 
00223     char xStr[32], yStr[32]; //, zStr[32];
00224     sprintf(xStr, "%d", FWMath::round(move.startPos.getX()));
00225     sprintf(yStr, "%d", FWMath::round(move.startPos.getY()));
00226     //sprintf(zStr, "%d", FWMath::round(move.startPos.getZ()));
00227     hostPtr->getDisplayString().setTagArg("p", 0, xStr);
00228     hostPtr->getDisplayString().setTagArg("p", 1, yStr);
00229 
00230   /* p parameter *does not* accept z co-ordinates. Tk has a 2-d view */
00231   //hostPtr->getDisplayString().setTagArg("p", 2, zStr);
00232 }

00241 void BaseMobility::reflectCoordinate(BorderHandling border, Coord& c)
00242 {
00243     switch( border ){
00244     case X_SMALLER:
00245         c.setX(-c.getX());
00246       break;
00247     case X_BIGGER:
00248         c.setX(2 * playgroundSizeX() - c.getX());
00249       break;
00250     case Y_SMALLER:
00251         c.setY(-c.getY());
00252       break;
00253     case Y_BIGGER:
00254         c.setY(2 * playgroundSizeY() - c.getY());
00255         break;
00256     case Z_SMALLER:
00257         c.setZ(-c.getZ());
00258         break;
00259     case Z_BIGGER:
00260         c.setZ(2 * playgroundSizeZ() - c.getZ());
00261       break;
00262     case NOWHERE:
00263     default:
00264       error("wrong border handling case!");
00265     }
00266 }
00267 
00279 void BaseMobility::reflectIfOutside(BorderHandling wo, Coord& stepTarget, Coord& targetPos, Coord& step, double& angle) {
00280 
00281     reflectCoordinate(wo, targetPos);
00282     reflectCoordinate(wo, stepTarget);
00283 
00284     switch( wo ){
00285     case X_SMALLER:
00286     case X_BIGGER:
00287         step.setX(-step.getX());
00288       angle = 180 - angle;
00289       break;
00290     case Y_SMALLER:
00291     case Y_BIGGER:
00292         step.setY(-step.getY());
00293       angle = -angle;
00294       break;
00295     case Z_SMALLER:
00296     case Z_BIGGER:
00297         step.setZ(-step.getZ());
00298       angle = -angle;
00299       break;
00300     case NOWHERE:
00301     default:
00302       error("wrong border handling case!");
00303     }
00304 }

00314 void BaseMobility::wrapIfOutside(BorderHandling wo, Coord& stepTarget, Coord& targetPos) {
00315     switch( wo ){
00316     case X_SMALLER:
00317     case X_BIGGER:
00318         targetPos.setX(fmod(targetPos.getX(), playgroundSizeX()));
00319         stepTarget.setX(fmod(stepTarget.getX(), playgroundSizeX()));
00320       break;
00321     case Y_SMALLER:
00322     case Y_BIGGER:
00323         targetPos.setY(fmod(targetPos.getY(), playgroundSizeY()));
00324         stepTarget.setY(fmod(stepTarget.getY(), playgroundSizeY()));
00325       break;
00326     case Z_SMALLER:
00327     case Z_BIGGER:
00328         targetPos.setZ(fmod(targetPos.getZ(), playgroundSizeZ()));
00329         stepTarget.setZ(fmod(stepTarget.getZ(), playgroundSizeZ()));
00330       break;
00331     case NOWHERE:
00332     default:
00333       error("wrong border handling case!");
00334     }
00335 }

00344 void BaseMobility::placeRandomlyIfOutside( Coord& targetPos )
00345 {
00346     targetPos = world->getRandomPosition();
00347 }

00349 
00357 BaseMobility::BorderHandling BaseMobility::checkIfOutside( Coord targetPos, Coord& borderStep )
00358 {
00359     BorderHandling outside = NOWHERE;
00360 
00361     // Testing x-value
00362     if (targetPos.getX() < 0){
00363   borderStep.setX(-move.startPos.getX());
00364   outside = X_SMALLER;
00365     }
00366     else if (targetPos.getX() >= playgroundSizeX()){
00367         borderStep.setX(playgroundSizeX() - move.startPos.getX());
00368   outside = X_BIGGER;
00369     }
00370 
00371     // Testing y-value
00372     if (targetPos.getY() < 0){
00373   borderStep.setY(-move.startPos.getY());
00374 
00375   if( outside==NOWHERE || fabs(borderStep.getX()/move.direction.getX()) > fabs(borderStep.getY()/move.direction.getY()) )
00376       outside = Y_SMALLER;
00377     }
00378     else if (targetPos.getY() >= playgroundSizeY()){
00379         borderStep.setY(playgroundSizeY() - move.startPos.getY());
00380 
00381   if( outside==NOWHERE || fabs(borderStep.getX()/move.direction.getX()) > fabs(borderStep.getY()/move.direction.getY()) )
00382       outside = Y_BIGGER;
00383     }
00384 
00385     // Testing z-value
00386     if (!world->use2D())
00387     {
00388       // going to reach the lower z-border
00389       if (targetPos.getZ() < 0)
00390       {
00391         borderStep.setZ(-move.startPos.getZ());
00392 
00393         // no border reached so far
00394         if( outside==NOWHERE )
00395         {
00396           outside = Z_SMALLER;
00397         }
00398         // an y-border is reached earliest so far, test whether z-border is reached even earlier
00399         else if( (outside==Y_SMALLER || outside==Y_BIGGER) &&
00400             fabs(borderStep.getY()/move.direction.getY()) > fabs(borderStep.getZ()/move.direction.getZ()) )
00401         {
00402           outside = Z_SMALLER;
00403         }
00404         // an x-border is reached earliest so far, test whether z-border is reached even earlier
00405         else if( (outside==X_SMALLER || outside==X_BIGGER) &&
00406             fabs(borderStep.getX()/move.direction.getX()) > fabs(borderStep.getZ()/move.direction.getZ()) )
00407         {
00408           outside = Z_SMALLER;
00409         }
00410 
00411       }
00412       // going to reach the upper z-border
00413       else if (targetPos.getZ() >= playgroundSizeZ())
00414       {
00415           borderStep.setZ(playgroundSizeZ() - move.startPos.getZ());
00416 
00417           // no border reached so far
00418           if( outside==NOWHERE )
00419           {
00420             outside = Z_BIGGER;
00421           }
00422           // an y-border is reached earliest so far, test whether z-border is reached even earlier
00423           else if( (outside==Y_SMALLER || outside==Y_BIGGER) &&
00424             fabs(borderStep.getY()/move.direction.getY()) > fabs(borderStep.getZ()/move.direction.getZ()) )
00425         {
00426           outside = Z_BIGGER;
00427         }
00428           // an x-border is reached earliest so far, test whether z-border is reached even earlier
00429         else if( (outside==X_SMALLER || outside==X_BIGGER) &&
00430             fabs(borderStep.getX()/move.direction.getX()) > fabs(borderStep.getZ()/move.direction.getZ()) )
00431         {
00432           outside = Z_BIGGER;
00433         }
00434 
00435 
00436       }
00437     }
00438 
00439     coreEV << "checkIfOutside, outside="<<outside<<" borderStep: " << borderStep.info() << endl;
00440 
00441     return outside;
00442 }

00444 
00450 void BaseMobility::goToBorder(BorderPolicy policy, BorderHandling wo, Coord& borderStep, Coord& borderStart)
00451 {
00452     double factor;
00453 
00454     coreEV << "goToBorder: startPos: "<< move.startPos.info() << " borderStep: " << borderStep.info()
00455      << " BorderPolicy: " << policy << " BorderHandling: " << wo << endl;
00456 
00457     switch( wo ){
00458     case X_SMALLER:
00459   factor = borderStep.getX() / move.direction.getX();
00460   borderStep.setY(factor * move.direction.getY());
00461   if (!world->use2D())
00462   {
00463     borderStep.setZ(factor * move.direction.getZ()); // 3D case
00464   }
00465 
00466 
00467   if( policy == WRAP ){
00468       borderStart.setX(playgroundSizeX());
00469       borderStart.setY(move.startPos.getY() + borderStep.getY());
00470       if (!world->use2D())
00471       {
00472         borderStart.setZ(move.startPos.getZ() + borderStep.getZ()); // 3D case
00473       }
00474   }
00475   break;
00476     case X_BIGGER:
00477   factor = borderStep.getX() / move.direction.getX();
00478   borderStep.setY(factor * move.direction.getY());
00479   if (!world->use2D())
00480   {
00481     borderStep.setZ(factor * move.direction.getZ()); // 3D case
00482   }
00483 
00484   if( policy == WRAP ){
00485       borderStart.setX(0);
00486       borderStart.setY(move.startPos.getY() + borderStep.getY());
00487       if (!world->use2D())
00488       {
00489         borderStart.setZ(move.startPos.getZ() + borderStep.getZ()); // 3D case
00490       }
00491   }
00492   break;
00493     case Y_SMALLER:
00494   factor = borderStep.getY() / move.direction.getY();
00495   borderStep.setX(factor * move.direction.getX());
00496   if (!world->use2D())
00497   {
00498     borderStep.setZ(factor * move.direction.getZ()); // 3D case
00499   }
00500 
00501   if( policy == WRAP ){
00502       borderStart.setY(playgroundSizeY());
00503       borderStart.setX(move.startPos.getX() + borderStep.getX());
00504       if (!world->use2D())
00505       {
00506         borderStart.setZ(move.startPos.getZ() + borderStep.getZ()); // 3D case
00507       }
00508   }
00509   break;
00510     case Y_BIGGER:
00511   factor = borderStep.getY() / move.direction.getY();
00512   borderStep.setX(factor * move.direction.getX());
00513   if (!world->use2D())
00514   {
00515     borderStep.setZ(factor * move.direction.getZ()); // 3D case
00516   }
00517 
00518   if( policy == WRAP ){
00519       borderStart.setY(0);
00520       borderStart.setX(move.startPos.getX() + borderStep.getX());
00521       if (!world->use2D())
00522       {
00523         borderStart.setZ(move.startPos.getZ() + borderStep.getZ()); // 3D case
00524       }
00525   }
00526   break;
00527     case Z_SMALLER: // here we are definitely in 3D
00528   factor = borderStep.getZ() / move.direction.getZ();
00529   borderStep.setX(factor * move.direction.getX());
00530   borderStep.setY(factor * move.direction.getY());
00531 
00532   if( policy == WRAP )
00533   {
00534       borderStart.setZ(playgroundSizeZ());
00535       borderStart.setX(move.startPos.getX() + borderStep.getX());
00536       borderStart.setY(move.startPos.getY() + borderStep.getY());
00537   }
00538     break;
00539     case Z_BIGGER: // here we are definitely in 3D
00540   factor = borderStep.getZ() / move.direction.getZ();
00541   borderStep.setX(factor * move.direction.getX());
00542   borderStep.setY(factor * move.direction.getY());
00543 
00544   if( policy == WRAP )
00545   {
00546       borderStart.setZ(0);
00547       borderStart.setX(move.startPos.getX() + borderStep.getX());
00548       borderStart.setY(move.startPos.getY() + borderStep.getY());
00549   }
00550     break;
00551     default:
00552         factor = 0;
00553   error("invalid state in goToBorder switch!");
00554     }
00555 
00556     coreEV << "goToBorder: startPos: "<< move.startPos.info() << " borderStep: " << borderStep.info()
00557      << " borderStart: " << borderStart.info() << " factor: " << factor << endl;
00558 }
00559 
00560 
00587 bool BaseMobility::handleIfOutside(BorderPolicy policy, Coord& stepTarget, Coord& targetPos, Coord& step, double& angle) {
00588     // where did the host leave the playground?
00589     BorderHandling wo;
00590 
00591     // step to reach the border
00592     Coord borderStep;
00593 
00594     wo = checkIfOutside(stepTarget, borderStep);
00595 
00596     // just return if the next step is not outside the playground
00597     if( wo == NOWHERE )
00598   return false;
00599 
00600     coreEV << "handleIfOutside:stepTarget = " << stepTarget.info() << endl;
00601 
00602     // new start position after the host reaches the border
00603     Coord borderStart;
00604     // new direction the host has to move to
00605     Coord borderDirection;
00606     // time to reach the border
00607     simtime_t borderInterval;
00608 
00609     coreEV << "old values: stepTarget: " << stepTarget.info() << " step: " << step.info()
00610      << " targetPos: " << targetPos.info() << " angle: " << angle << endl;
00611 
00612     // which border policy is to be followed
00613     switch (policy){
00614     case REFLECT:
00615   reflectIfOutside( wo, stepTarget, targetPos, step, angle );
00616   break;
00617     case WRAP:
00618   wrapIfOutside( wo, stepTarget, targetPos );
00619   break;
00620     case PLACERANDOMLY:
00621   placeRandomlyIfOutside( targetPos );
00622   break;
00623     case RAISEERROR:
00624   break;
00625     }
00626 
00627     coreEV << "new values: stepTarget: " << stepTarget.info() << " step: " << step.info() << " angle: " << angle << endl;
00628 
00629     // calculate the step to reach the border
00630     goToBorder(policy, wo, borderStep, borderStart);
00631 
00632     // calculate the time to reach the border
00633     //borderInterval = sqrt(borderStep.getX()*borderStep.getX() + borderStep.getY()*borderStep.getY()) / move.speed;
00634     borderInterval = (borderStep.length()) / move.speed;
00635 
00636     // calculate new start position
00637     // NOTE: for WRAP this is done in goToBorder
00638     switch( policy ){
00639     case REFLECT:
00640   double d;
00641 
00642   borderStart = move.startPos + borderStep;
00643   d = stepTarget.distance( borderStart );
00644   //borderDirection.setX((stepTarget.getX() - borderStart.getX()) / d);
00645   //borderDirection.setY((stepTarget.getY() - borderStart.getY()) / d);
00646   //borderDirection.setZ((stepTarget.getZ() - borderStart.getZ()) / d);
00647   borderDirection = (stepTarget - borderStart) / d;
00648   break;
00649     case PLACERANDOMLY:
00650   borderStart = targetPos;
00651   stepTarget = targetPos;
00652   break;
00653     case WRAP:
00654     case RAISEERROR:
00655   break;
00656     default:
00657   error("unknown BorderPolicy");
00658     }
00659 
00660     coreEV << "border handled, borderStep: "<< borderStep.info() << "borderStart: " << borderStart.info()
00661      << " stepTarget " << stepTarget.info() << endl;
00662 
00663     // create a border self message and schedule it appropriately
00664     BorderMsg *bMsg = new BorderMsg("borderMove", MOVE_TO_BORDER);
00665     bMsg->setPolicy(policy);
00666     bMsg->setStartPos(borderStart);
00667     bMsg->setDirection(borderDirection);
00668 
00669     scheduleAt(simTime() + borderInterval, bMsg);
00670 
00671     return true;
00672 }
